info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 5:49PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds will impact portions of southeastern Hamilton, northwestern Warren and northwestern Saratoga Counties through 615 PM EST... At 548 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with gusty winds near Lake Pleasant, or 11 miles south of Speculator, moving east at 85 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Warrensburg, Speculator, Lake George Village, Johnsburg, Lake Pleasant, Wells, Chestertown, Sacandaga Campground, Moffitt Beach Campground, Thurman, Lake George, Stony Creek, Harrisburg, Thurman Station, Big Hollow, Gilmantown, Sodom, Girards Sugarbush, Starbuckville and Perkins Clearing. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 21 and 23, and near exit 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
